section.name: Properties
section.p: Some commands can be configured by defining properties. These properties are stored in the karma.properties in the project base dir of a working context.

An example of such a properties file (in this case with properties for the build-module command) is:
java.compiler=modern java.source=1.4 java.target=1.4 java.debug=true java.debuglevel=none javac.nowarn=true javac.optimize=off javac.deprecation=off javac.verbose=yes javac.depend=off
See the documentation of the commands for their respective options.
